ja500:8.1: kammāni karoti bālo → karonti bālā (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja500:8.2: Idhameva → idameva (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, Ma-aka) | imameva (mr), maññamāno → maññamānā (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja500:9.2: Na bandhuvā → na bandhavā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, mr), na sarīravaṇṇo yo → na sarīrāvakāso (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja500:13.4: iddhiṃ paññopi loke → iddhiparo hi loke (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | iddhiparo hi loko (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja500:16.4: hi naṃ → sirihīnaṃ (bj, mr) | sirīhīnaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed), na paññā → na paññaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
